project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for specified numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Implement user input functionality for selecting columns
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
